name: Ascendant Species (Visual Novel)
description:
Einar lives in a world controlled by the krystics.... Terrible monsters that have a crystalline structure. Krystics do not eat, they do not sleep, they only kill.

Einar now; along with his 2 childhood friends, need to fight for survival.

The actions and path that he chooses depends on you.....will you help him survive?

Or will you cause only hurt in the end?

This is his story....choose wisely

INSTALLATION

Just extract and play!

Hey guys! Just wanted to say a couple things.

If you see anything in the auto save folder  just disregard it.

Please take a look at Ross Bugden when you have the chance. He created a lot of the music in this: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQKGLOK2FqmVgVwYferltKQ

Also check out droidz.org if you need animation figures: http://droidz.org/stickmain/

And SoundBible if you need sound effects: http://soundbible.com/

Aaaaaaand check out my website for updates on my upcoming projects: https://dellanimeproductions.wordpress.com/home/
